divs: Sighting DetailsToday my friend and I were having a conversation about aliens and their existence. After a little he told me a of a time he swears that he was either abducted or just messed with by aliens. His story goes "so I was on my couch in the livingvroom watching tv relaxin. I start to dose off and fall asleep, then bam. I wake up and my bodys shaking like I'm having a seizure. I couldn't feel anything I couldn't make a sound. I look up through my kitchen and see two very tall probably 8 9 feet, and very thin entities, standing straight up at my back sliding glass door. A bright white light over them as they just stood and starred. The light started to get brighter then all I remember is waking up on my couch." I questioned him saying it coulda been a dream just seemed real. He swore there was no way, it was verry verry real and is convinced it happened.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around January 15th 2011
Summary: Friend wakes up shaking then sees very dark entity
